summary_one_paragraph: This file review document, dated December 1978, summarizes materials related to William P. Burke Jr., covering the inclusive dates of 1947-1962. The file contains various personnel actions including notification of personnel action forms, retirement paperwork, salary adjustments, and a recommendation for the Intelligence Medal of Merit for outstanding service as Chief of the New Orleans Field Office. The file also includes a letter from Director John A. McCone congratulating Burke on his retirement.
title: Burke, William P. Jr.
